Don't worry, we all know Jeb has no soul.
Anyone know why Ike appears to move up and down in the sky of Duna? It is as if Ike speeds up and slows down in its orbit.

Anyone know why Ike appears to move up and down in the sky of Duna? It is as if Ike speeds up and slows down in its orbit.

Ike is in an almost synchronous orbit with Duna. Its orbit is just a tiny bit eccentric, so it slows when further from Duna and speeds up when closer, causing it to appear to oscillate eastward and westward when viewed from Duna's surface.
